p: In a recent publication SARS-CoV-2-specific CD4 + and CD8 + T cells responses were measured in COVID-19 cases. Using flow cytometry, among other approaches, SARS-CoV-2-specific CD4 +T cell were seen in all COVID-19 cases, and CD8 + T cell responses were seen in most, thus, flow cytometry could present a potential for COVID-19 diagnosis, alongside other potential laboratory indicators like PCTâ€¦etc.
